content: in this legal case the avezzano court issued a decision regarding compensation the judge ordered the dissolution of a community property and divided the assets among the parties involved specific properties and cash amounts were assigned to each party the judge also declared one partys application for the dissolution of the community property inadmissible additionally the judge ordered one party to pay a portion of the rent received from certain properties to the plaintiff the text also discussed the division of the estate and the validity of certain donations made by the deceased the judge determined the value of the estate and the reserved share for the plaintiff the application for the division of the community property was deemed inadmissible and a counterclaim for restitution was rejected the costs of the proceedings were also discussed the court of first instance made a final judgment assigning various assets to the parties involved the judgment also ordered the payment of rent and the compensation of litigation costs
